constituent: scenery, sun, day, capital, tall, top hat, mouth, small, little
heisigStory: Scenery is depicted as a sun rising over a capital city, which is a bit of natural scenery the city dwellers themselves rarely get to see!
koohiiStory1: Imaging the sun rising over the capital--classic postcard scenery.
koohiiStory2: Anyone who´s been to Kyoto doesn´t need to think too deeply into this Kanji! Imagine a sunny day in the old capital, and there´s no better scenery.
